1013738440213573632.text: I’m a physicist as well. A flat Earther told me that I need to unlearn everything I know. I said, “I have a medical education and a Ph.D in physics. That’s going to take way too much effort.”https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1013587829421756416 …

1013766483678302208.text: An uneducated populace is so much easier to control. They'll believe just about anything...like news is fake, and the President isn't really golfing that much.
